resources.string: "The limited-edition special S 65 Final Edition model from Mercedes-AMG marks the pinnacle of the 6.0-litre V12 biturbo engine’s long success story on board the S-Class Saloon"
"The first fully electric Mercedes-Benz combines minimalistic design with performance and fun driving properties – all with zero local emissions. Describing the EQC in one word? Quite a challenge"
"More space, more power, more goose pimples – the new Mercedes-AMG GT 4-door model delivers driving experiences in new dimensions and extends the AMG model family."
"The sporty STRONGER THAN TIME Edition. One of the six sporty exclusive finishes from G manufaktur. Inside, enjoy the Nappa leather in titanium grey pearl"
"The C 63 S is the bedrock of Mercedes-AMG. Drivers and fans love it because it is one of a kind in its segment. Its signature feature is the immensely powerful eight-cylinder engine "
